00026 struct SDL_mutex;
00027 
00028 struct Logger {
00029  int minCoutVerb;
00030  int minIngameConVerb;
00031  int minCallstackVerb;
00032  std::string prefix;
00033  std::string buffer;
00034  bool lastWasNewline;
00035  SDL_mutex* mutex;
00036  
00037  Logger(int o, int ingame, int callst, const std::string& p);
00038  ~Logger();
00039  void lock(); void unlock();
00040  
00041  struct LockedStreamWrapper {
00042   Logger* logger;
00043   LockedStreamWrapper(Logger* l) : logger(l) {}
00044   LockedStreamWrapper(const LockedStreamWrapper& l) : logger(l.logger) { ((LockedStreamWrapper&)l).logger = NULL; }
00045   ~LockedStreamWrapper() { if(logger) logger->unlock(); }
00046   Logger* push_back() { Logger* tmp = logger; logger = NULL; return tmp; }
00047   Logger* push_back_and_unlock() { Logger* tmp = push_back(); tmp->unlock(); return tmp; }
00048   
00049   LockedStreamWrapper& operator<<(const std::string& msg) { logger->buffer += msg; return *this; }
00050   template<typename _T> LockedStreamWrapper& operator<<(_T v) { return operator<<(to_string(v)); }
00051   Logger& operator<<(Logger& (*__pf)(Logger&)) { return (*__pf)(*push_back_and_unlock()); }
00052   Logger& flush() { return push_back_and_unlock()->flush(); }
00053  };
00054  
00055  LockedStreamWrapper operator<<(const std::string& msg) { lock(); buffer += msg; return LockedStreamWrapper(this); }
00056  Logger& operator<<(Logger& (*__pf)(Logger&)) { return (*__pf)(*this); }
00057  template<typename _T> LockedStreamWrapper operator<<(_T v) { return operator<<(to_string(v)); }
00058  Logger& flush();
00059  
00060  // deprecated, only for easier find/replace with printf
00061  void operator()(const std::string& str) { (*this) << str; flush(); }
00062 };
00063 
00064 inline Logger& endl(Logger& __os) { return (__os << "\n").flush(); }
00065 inline Logger& flush(Logger& __os) { return __os.flush(); }
00066 
00067 template< Logger& l >
00068 void printOnLogger(const std::string& str) { l << str; }
00069 
00070 
00071 extern Logger notes;
00072 extern Logger hints;
00073 extern Logger warnings;
00074 extern Logger errors;
00075 
00076 #endif
